tika-abh08t42:9_3: And they’ve reached the far shore because of the fodder. They’d be destroyed by light.
tika-abh08t42:9_4: one should scatter basickets by breaking out of the profession.
tika-abh08t42:9_5: and whether as they’ve heard it from others.
tika-abh08t42:9_6: He shows the bowl of water, thinking, “The handful, we’ll give away,” “Not, and it’s not enough for meditation.
tika-abh08t42:9_7: even if the three blossoms were to thoroughly threw out of that bag.
